mistral:7b-instruct: The EPO plan from Australian Unity Health provides comprehensive coverage for your health conditions, offering hospitalization coverage, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care - all essential components for managing diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and potential complications related to these conditions. With a monthly premium of $300, it offers an affordable option given your middle income bracket, while providing coverage up to $500,000. The plan's maximum out-of-pocket expenses ($6500) can help minimize additional financial burden during healthcare encounters. Additionally, this plan excludes cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments, ensuring that you won't be charged for unnecessary or unproven treatments. Considering your health profile and income bracket, the EPO plan from Australian Unity Health offers a balanced combination of coverage and affordability tailored to meet your needs.
